TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ABPersonViewControllerDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool ShouldPerformDefaultActionForPerson (this MonoTouch.AddressBookUI.IABPersonViewControllerDelegate This, MonoTouch.AddressBookUI.ABPersonViewController personViewController, IntPtr person, int propertyId, int identifier);
